paragraphs.body: This is the talk page for the article "Spirit Wilds images".
paragraphs.text: This is the talk page for the article "Spirit Wilds images".

paragraphs.body: This article is currently rated C-class on the Avatar Wiki grading system.
paragraphs.text: This article is currently rated C-class on the Avatar Wiki grading system.

paragraphs.body: I noticed that this image category covers only the Era of Raava Spirit Wilds. The main article covers the ones from the poles, the swamp, and the ones in Republic City as well. Is it ok to add images from those Spirit Wilds to this category? Omnibender - Talk - Contributions 16:58, May 31, 2015 (UTC)
paragraphs.text: I noticed that this image category covers only the Era of Raava Spirit Wilds. The main article covers the ones from the poles, the swamp, and the ones in Republic City as well. Is it ok to add images from those Spirit Wilds to this category? Omnibender - Talk - Contributions 16:58, May 31, 2015 (UTC)
